item.title: System Incident - GNOSIS - Production
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Potential Issue with GNOSIS Product

Internal support teams are investigating a potential issue within the GNOSIS product to determine and resolve any impact. More information will be provided as it becomes available. Summary: The company is investigating a potential issue with the GNOSIS product, and internal support teams are working to resolve any impact.

Feb 26, 09:42 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the GNOSIS product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - Optum LYNX Outpatient Charge Capture Cloud - Production
item.content:encoded:
```html [High] - Connectivity Issues with Outpatient Charge Capture

Summary: Outpatient Charge Capture (LYNX) systems are operating as expected, but there are reports of connectivity issues impacting outbound charge data. Support teams are investigating the issue. ```

Feb 22, 09:02 CST
Resolved - Our teams have investigated reports of connectivity issues impacting outbound charge data. We have identified that Outpatient Charge Capture (LYNX) systems are operating as expected. Please contact our support department if you are experiencing connectivity concerns related to your interfaces. Thank you for your patience as we worked to resolve this system incident.

Feb 22, 07:13 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the Optum LYNX Outpatient Charge Capture Cloud product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

```html Low - Potential Issue with Optum LYNX Outpatient Charge Capture Summary: There is a potential issue with the Optum LYNX Outpatient Charge Capture product, and internal support teams are working to resolve any impact. ```

Resolved - Our teams have restored full application functionality. The issue is resolved, thank you for your patience as we worked to resolve this system incident.

Feb 19, 09:23 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the Optum LYNX Outpatient Charge Capture product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - OPTUM DATA EXCHANGE - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 16, 17:29 CST
Resolved - ODX Engineering support aborted messages and restarted services on the Primary server to restore service.

Feb 16, 15:51 CST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 16, 15:45 CST
Update - ODX : Team has engaged InterSystems to determine why message processing stopped after failed back server A . We will provide our next update in approximately one hour.

Feb 16, 12:39 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the OPTUM DATA EXCHANGE product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - GNOSIS - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 23:41 CST
Resolved - This was manually shut down as part of CHG2133268 as they have moved to the cloud. The server should be powered off and will be decommissioned in the future.

Feb 9, 23:36 CST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 9, 23:12 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the GNOSIS product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - Multiple Products - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 8, 17:45 CST
Resolved - Support teams executed a maintenance activity restart to the impacted section of the database environment to resolve the lock and restore service for users.

Feb 8, 15:30 CST
Update - Support teams are investigating why clinical data messaging is queuing for several tenants.

Feb 8, 15:15 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the multiple products. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - Enterprise CAC - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 8, 16:43 CST
Resolved - Optum technical teams have resolved the latency that was occurring for some users within the Enterprise Computer-Assisted Coding application. Thank you for your patience as our teams worked to resolve this issue.

Feb 7, 17:45 CST
Update - Optum technical teams have continued to investigate the latency that was occurring for some users within the Enterprise Computer-Assisted Coding application. At this time the system is performing as expected and the reported latency has subsided. We will continue to monitor through the night and provide another update tomorrow morning. Thank you for your patience as we continue to investigate.

Feb 7, 10:24 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the Enterprise CAC product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - Optum Care Coordination Platform - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 1, 11:45 CST
Resolved - The application support team disabled the affected permissions to restore service to the Optum Care Coordination Platform.

Feb 1, 11:40 CST
Update - Optum Care Coordination Platform continuity of care documents are not being displayed for some clinicians. Support team is reviewing code and certificate for issues.

Feb 1, 11:35 CST
Investigating - We are aware of a potential issue occurring within the Optum Care Coordination Platform product. Internal support teams have been engaged to determine and resolve any impact. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.

item.title: System Incident - Payment Integrity Compass - Production
item.content:encoded:
Feb 1, 05:00 CST
Resolved - Optum technical teams have resolved the issues impacting PIC and have validated the availability of the application. Thank you for your patience as our teams worked to resolve this issue.

Feb 1, 03:56 CST
Investigating - We have identified an issue with Payment Integrity Compass (PIC) rendering the application unavailable. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.
Impact: PIC application unavailable

item.title: System Incident - Optum Enterprise CAC - Production
item.content:encoded:
Jan 29, 08:47 CST
Resolved - Optum technical teams restarted the affected instance and have validated that the service is restored. We will be investigating with our 3rd party vendor to help prevent this from happening again. . Thank you for your patience as our teams worked to resolve this issue.

Jan 29, 08:12 CST
Investigating - We are aware of an issue occurring within the Enterprise Computer-Assisted Coding application that is causing issues with the logic encoder, latency, and incorrect Patient Demographics.
Technical teams are engaged to resolve the issue and we will provide updates as more information becomes available.
